title: Process a Drop-Ship Order
description: A customer orders an item that is not stocked in the warehouse but is instead shipped directly from a supplier (drop-shipped).

tasks.description: When the order is placed, the system identifies the item as a drop-ship item.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system correctly flags the order for drop-shipping.

tasks.description: The system automatically generates a purchase order for the item and sends it to the designated supplier, including the customer's shipping address.
tasks.expected_outcome: A PO is created and sent to the supplier with the correct shipping details.

tasks.description: The system waits for a shipping confirmation (ASN) from the supplier to update the customer's order status.
tasks.expected_outcome: The order remains in 'Processing' status until the supplier provides a tracking number.
